data.title: StarLight Travels: Daily Meditations for the Eastern Star
data.meta_description: StarLight Travels: Daily Meditations for the Eastern Star by Fuller PWM, Sis. Joyce J. - ISBN 10: 1541157192 - ISBN 13: 9781541157194 - CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform - 2017 - Softcover
data.text:
A well written book of inspiration and daily meditations to guide any Sister along her daily travels. Appropriate for the general public, candidates and novice members! A great contribution to the Order of Eastern Star. A true representation of what the Order Eastern Stars is all about!

"synopsis" may belong to another edition of this title.

About the Author:

Joyce J. Fuller was born in Poitier, France and grew up in East Texas. She attended Tyler Jr. College, Amarillo College, Delgado College, University of California at Berkeley and Kaplan University. She holds Certification and Licensure as aMasters Level Addictions Professional (MCAP). Mrs. Fuller holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Criminal Justice and a Masters Degree in Psychology. She is the Owner and CEO of Taylor County Recovery Center, aSubstance Abuse Treatment program in Perry, Fl. Having worked in the public sector as an Executive Board member of Rehabilitation Services for Women w/children, as a member of the Mayor’s Committee for a Better New Orleans (CBNO) Public Safety task Force, as a panel member in the Incarcerated Population Workgroup planning committee and also the New Orleans Regional Aids Planning Council. She is the owner of Dynamic Ceramics, Inc. and enjoys making ceramics and porcelain dolls. She and Mr. Fuller have 10 children and 11 grandchildren. She currently resides in FL

"About this title" may belong to another edition of this title.
